extendedInfo.description: Ready for a gluten free night on the town?  Looking for safe gluten free dining options? This app searches through tens of thousands of restaurants from our constantly updated community-edited database. Supports GPS, keyword search, or entering your own address!keywords: gluten-free, Celiac Disease, restaurants

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Scanner doesn\'t work, and when I type in a specific restaurant to search it comes back with nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Two thumbs down
reviews.comment: This app sucks I want to find places that have gluten free and are near bye not every grocery store or every restraint in the US and Canada it isn\'t a helpful app.
reviews.author: shanti steinauer

reviews.title: Wish it could be no stars
reviews.comment: It seems to be an advertisement. Well it brings up as 1 restaurant. bring up the same 1, 5 times. I find it hard to believe that of all the restaurants in the town is only 1 I personally know of 6 in the area. That\'s why I think this is nothing more than an advertising medium and it is worthless. It gave me the address of hamburger joint I went there and they had nothing for somebody with a gluten problem.
reviews.author: Bob Peterson

reviews.title: Fairly good
reviews.comment: This app is better than most
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great start
reviews.comment: This is a great app but it would be nice to put distance info in listing. Also hope to see more local restaurants listed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Slow, clunky. Only has like 3 chains listed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: I enjoy being able 2 find something near wherever we are. U can choose 2 see all the \"chain\" type restaurants, or not. Very handy app! Droid Incredib
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not terrible, could be much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap App.
reviews.comment: Never really loaded. Kept having to download. It wouldn\'t scan.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lame, all it shows is Dairy Queen, Red Robin and Outback. Even if there isn\'t one near you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app, especially when I travel - provides lots of options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor quality app
reviews.comment: Scanner doesn\'t work w Droid Razr Maxx. Database of foods is very limited.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hasn\'t updated since I downloaded this a year ago. Still doesn\'t even have PF Changs listed as gluten free. Out of date and never updated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Wr live in south bend, Indiana and it pointed us to Oregon.  For jetsetters I guess.
reviews.author: Daniel Derrow

reviews.comment: Not helpful at all. List some restaurants as \"gluten free status unknown.\" The restaurants\' own websites tend to be much more helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I seem to get the same 2 or 3 chains no matter where i search. Needs more restaurants.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Garbage! Only shows 100 dairy queens, 50 Boston markets and an outback, not even close.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t search by location. Needs to tie in w/ Local. Urban Spoon is better.
reviews.author: Colin Betts

reviews.comment: This is ridiculous, outback steakhouse? I bet if you eat there you WILL get cross contaminated. same with ALL of the other options it presented me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app.
reviews.author: A Google User
